entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.2.0
entry.content:
🥳 New Features 🎉

🛜 Network Device Management & Command Line Client – Connect and manage devices using either a WireGuard connection or our headless command-line client. A new dedicated section on the dashboard now showcases network device statistics.

➕ Multiple addresses per network interface in gateway (with IPv4 and IPv6) is now supported.

😈 FreeBSD and OPNSense new package/plugin

🔄 Google External OIDC now includes the ability to automatically synchronize users, groups, and user statuses. It can also decide to disable or delete users in Defguard based on the Google Directory. Same functionality will be available for other external OIDC providers (Microsoft, Okta, …) soon.

🖥️ Desktop Client detects if the connection is active, notifies the user if it isn’t, and attempts to reconnect automatically.

📥 New Gateway disconnect notifications section in settings

🔔 Defguard will now notify you when a new release is available and/or if it’s a critical security update.

👥 Any group can be defined as admin group

Please consider buying the enterprise license to support us!

🎗️Please remember that all enterprise features are free (up to certain limits) The whole defguard team thanks you! 🫡

🪲 Fixes

📊 Dashboard statistics had a major rewrite and now they should be more accrue and reliable

📏 Fixed interface name if location name is long #933

🏭 TOTP code fixes

📖 Upgrade notes

Please remember to read the upgrade notes before doing the upgrade!

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.2.1
entry.content:
🥳 New Features 🎉

🔄 Microsoft External OIDC can now synchronize users and groups (directory synchronization) based on their status in Microsoft Entra ID. The same functionality will be also soon available for other external OIDC providers (Okta, Jumpcloud...). You can learn more about Defguard directory synchronization feature here.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.2.3
entry.content:
🥳 New Features 🎉

🔄 Okta directory synchronization – Defguard can now synchronize users and groups (directory synchronization) based on their status in Okta

👥 The limit of maximum users and groups that can be synchronized by the directory synchronization was increased in all providers to 10000.

🪲 Fixes

✉️ Allow using SMTP servers without authentication

⚙️ Fixed an issue with users disabled by directory synchronization not being instantly removed from the VPN network

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3
